intro.content:
Welcome to Custom Views

This is a simple demo of the Custom Views library.

advancedIntro.content:
Welcome to the Advanced View

This view contains more advanced features.

expertIntro.content:
Welcome to the Expert View

This view is for expert users only.

gitInitMac.content:
# Initialize a new Git repository on macOS
$ git init my-project
$ cd my-project
$ git config user.name "Your Name"
$ git config user.email "your.email@example.com"

gitInitLinux.content:
# Initialize a new Git repository on Linux
$ git init my-project
$ cd my-project
$ git config --global user.name "Your Name"
$ git config --global user.email "your.email@example.com"

gitInitWindows.content:
# Initialize a new Git repository on Windows
PS> git init my-project
PS> cd my-project
PS> git config user.name "Your Name"
PS> git config user.email "your.email@example.com"

fileStructureMac.content:
🍎 macOS Application Structure

/Applications/MyApp.app/
├── Contents/
│   ├── Info.plist
│   ├── MacOS/
│   │   └── MyApp
│   └── Resources/
│       ├── icon.icns
│       └── data/
└── ~/Library/Application Support/MyApp/

fileStructureLinux.content:
🐧 Linux Application Structure

/usr/bin/myapp
/etc/myapp/
├── config.conf
└── settings/
/var/lib/myapp/
├── data/
└── logs/
~/.config/myapp/
└── user-settings.conf

fileStructureWindows.content:
🪟 Windows Application Structure

C:\Program Files\MyApp\
├── MyApp.exe
├── config.ini
├── lib\
│   └── dependencies.dll
C:\Users\%USERNAME%\AppData\Roaming\MyApp\
├── settings.json
└── data\
